title: [SOLVED]820-2850 no speaker audio
message:
Hi just got a 820-2850 in from a customer that has no audio.  it has audio out the jack but not the speakers. i tested it on a working case/ speaker.  any specific place or parts to look around? 
Thanks
nate

title: [SOLVED]820-2850 no speaker audio
message: Probably bad headphone jack. Easiest fix is just to remove R6805 and disable the SPDIF function.

title: [SOLVED]820-2850 no speaker audio
message: awesome. works perfect now. thanks a lot!
